alert.note: Alert for Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 14 at 5:08AM CST until December 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 35 to 50 MPH with gusts 70 to 80 MPH possible. * WHERE...Interstate 80 corridor from Cheyenne to Sidney including the cities of Cheyenne, Pine Bluffs, Kimball, Sidney, Harrisburg, and Bridgeport. * WHEN...8 AM until 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. There will be a high risk for vehicle blow overs, particularly along north to south oriented roadways. Winds of this magnitude can also lead to property damage and localized power outages.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
